## [{{ repo[["name"]] }}]({{ repo[["html_url"]] }})

```{r, results='asis'}
workflows <- gh::gh("/repos/{{ repo[['full_name']] }}/actions/workflows") |>
  purrr::pluck("workflows") |> 
  purrr::keep(~ .x[["state"]] == "active") |>
  purrr::map_chr(~ glue::glue("[![]({.x[['badge_url']]})]({.x[['html_url']]})")) |>
  cat(sep = "\n\n") |> 
  identity()
```
